mapper.insert: insert into member (id, password, name, phone, email, birth,gender) values (#{id},sha1(#{password}),hex(AES_ENCRYPT(#{name},sha1(#{name}))) ,hex(AES_ENCRYPT(#{phone},sha1(#{phone}))) ,hex(AES_ENCRYPT(#{email},sha1(#{email}))) ,#{birth},#{gender})
mapper.select: select id, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(name),sha1(#{name})) name , AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(phone),sha1(#{phone})) phone ,AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(email),sha1(#{email})) email ,birth,refundaccount as refundAccount ,membership_status as membershipStatus, joindate as joinDate from member where id=#{id} and password=sha1(#{password})
